Package at.htlkaindorf.scenes

Class Hud

java.lang.Object
at.htlkaindorf.scenes.Hud
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
public class Hud
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
The hud of the game. It shows values like score, time, world, ... on the playscreen. It implements the Diasposable class.

    Sets the skin of the hud and adds all Labels to the hud.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update​(float dt)
      Updates the world counter and sets timeUp true if the worldTimer reaches zero. It also reloads the level if the timeUp is true.
      Parameters:
      dt - delta time
      Since:
      1.0

    • addScore

      public void addScore​(int value)
      Adds a value to the score and updates lblScore.
      Parameters:
      value - the value which is added to the score
      Since:
      1.0
